main event: A report detailing a UFO sighting in Sulpher Grove, Oldtown, Ohio on March 28, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared brightly and had a luminous reddish tinge to bluish white color,One witness described the object's motion as moving from 5 to 90 degrees in 15 minutes,Another witness thought it was simply a star,The report mentioned a possible illusion of a 30 ft drop,No physical evidence or photographs were included in the report.
sighted object: a luminous object with reddish tinge to bluish white color
witness description: vague descriptions regarding the object's motion
